name: EPS Packaging
description: Complete EPS packaging solutions for product protection and transport, including corner protectors, sheets, boops, cubes, spacers and customizable molds.

hero.title: EPS Packaging
hero.description: Complete EPS solutions for efficient protection during transport and storage, damping vibrations and impacts.

categoryDescription.title: Isoart EPS Packaging offers efficient and customized protection for various products.
categoryDescription.description: Isoart EPS Packaging is manufactured in high-quality expanded polystyrene, offering efficient protection that dampens vibrations and impacts during transport and storage. Including corner protectors, sheets, boops, cubes, spacers and customizable molds, they meet the needs of logistics, e-commerce and retail industries with efficiency and sustainability.

benefits.title: Efficient protection
benefits.description: Dampens vibrations and impacts during transport.

benefits.title: Sustainability
benefits.description: 100% recyclable, with reverse logistics by Isoart.

generalCharacteristics: Does not propagate fungi or bacteria

applications.title: Efficient protection for products during transport and storage
applications.description: Isoart EPS Packaging is ideal for protecting fragile products during transport and storage. With high impact resistance and customization, they serve logistics, e-commerce and retail industries, reducing damage and costs.

tabDescriptions.Efficient protection: High-density EPS absorbs shocks and dampens vibrations, protecting fragile products during transport and storage.
tabDescriptions.Customization: Produced to measure, packaging meets different sizes and formats, optimizing logistics.
tabDescriptions.Lightness: With density of 10-15 kg/m³, they reduce packaging weight, decreasing transport costs.
tabDescriptions.Sustainability: 100% recyclable and CFC-free, Isoart moldings are environmentally responsible.
